description: [TA505](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0092) has used base64 encoded PowerShell commands.(Citation: Cybereason TA505 April 2019)(Citation: Deep Instinct TA505 Apr 2019)

external_references.description: Salem, E. (2019, April 25). Threat Actor TA505 Targets Financial Enterprises Using LOLBins and a New Backdoor Malware. Retrieved May 28, 2019.
Vilkomir-Preisman, S. (2019, April 2). New ServHelper Variant Employs Excel 4.0 Macro to Drop Signed Payload. Retrieved May 28, 2019.
